pages.text: The classic $(thing)staff$(), a weapon for the aspiring mage. $(thing)Staves$() are a multi-purpose weapon type that serve as both a utility tool and a functional weapon.$(br2)$(thing)Staves$() deal magic damage, with any projectiles being energy-based, similar to $(l:aoa3:blasters#blasters)blasters$(/l).
pages.title: Staves

pages.text: Each $(thing)staff$() will have its own unique abilities and powers, and each one will need to be considered on its own, rather than being compared to any other in its class.$(br)The $(thing)staves$() that do deal damage will do so $(o)magically$(/o), penetrating armour and hitting hard.$(br2)$(thing)Staves$() consume $(thing)runes$() to charge their casts, meaning there is a somewhat-noticeable cost to using them.
Stand tall at the entry to your home and shout "You shall not pass!" at your enemies.
pages.title: A Staff

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)staves$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
